title: Hacking the nano
content:
I'm too excited about this not to post it.

I recently installed [Linux](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102053122/http:/www.ipodlinux.org/) on my iPod Nano. Now it plays [video](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102053122/http:/video.google.com/videoplay?docid=6663282946491117841), [Doom](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102053122/http:/video.google.com/videoplay?docid=4032841114584378958), and the [arcade games](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102053122/http:/yorgle.cis.rit.edu/Hardware/nanomame/) I used to play as a kid. Why would I ever want to boot into Apple's standard iPod OS after getting a taste of this?
author: Jared Benson
